text: Dearly Beloved is the sixth studio album by American rock band Daughtry. It was released on September 17, 2021. Tracklist: 01\. Desperation {04:49} 02\. World On Fire {03:35} 03\. Heavy Is The Crown {03:55} 04\. Changes Are Coming {03:41} 05\. Dearly Beloved {03:43} 06\. Cry For Help {03:33} 07\. Asylum {03:55} 08\. Evil {03:32} 09\. The Victim {03:41} 10\. Somebody {03:40} 11\. Call You Mine {04:15} 12\. Lioness {03:36 13\. Break Into My Heart {03:50} 14\. Hunger Strike (ft. Lajon Witherspoon) {04:03} 15\. Heavy Is The Crown (Acoustic) {04:08} 16\. Changes Are Coming (Acoustic) {04:00}
title: Dearly Beloved (2021)
